constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 88 (Thursday, May 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROSENDALE:
H.R. 3436.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H2654]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

sponsors.fullName: Rep. Rosendale Sr., Matthew M. [R-MT-At Large]

title: Direct Primary Care Accessibility Act of 2021
